quote: Working hard for something we don't care about is called stress: Working hard for something we love is called passion. – Simon Sinek
fact: There are more psychoanalysts per capita in Buenos Aires than any other place in the world.
joke: When people are sad, I sometimes let them colour in my tattoos. Sometimes all they need is a shoulder to crayon.
